Author: many_mishaps_melly
Text: In answer to your question, I have no idea! ðŸ˜‚ That doesn't help at all but I relate very hard to this.   I avoided thinspo for ages but now I am back to scrolling and scrolling and just imagining what it's going to be like to feel like that. I have one particular image I keep looking at because she looks like I did when I was at my smallest - but she looks happier, healthier and much better than I did.   Which actually has made me realise just now that maybe my brain is telling me that I was/could be like that but actually I never will be? So maybe it's not good? I dunno
